Problem Details Task 1: Find the position of 0.097 Hints The number line extends from 0.0 to 1.0. Think about which number 0.097 is closer to: 0, 1, or the middle of the number line at 0.5? Ability level classification criteria: Low-level students typically understand math problems slowly and need more time and help to solve them.
